allSavedBuildsHaveBeenDeleted: all saved builds have been deleted
buildStatsHaveBeenLoaded: the build's stats have been loaded
buildHasBeenLoadedInTheComparator: the build have been loaded in the Comparator
buildHasBeenSaved: the build has been saved, click on 'Collection' to find it
buildHasBeenUnsaved: the build has been removed from your Collection
buildCopiedInClipboard: build copied to clipboard. You can now share it via message
